entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Where is all the outrage over 750,000 dead in 5 years from Big Pharma and the opioid epidemic?  Yes we have lost 40,000 from Coronavirus, it is awful but let's get a little perspective people!!! 645,000 from heart disease, 550,000 from cancer, the list goes on and on. Wake up!
